title: Quiz  - SchemesTap 16th to 31st March 2023
instruction: With the progressive change in the socio-economic fabric of the country more and more women are leaving their homes in search of employment in big cities as well as urban and rural industrial clusters. One of the main difficulties faced by such women is lack of safe and conveniently located accommodation. The Government of India being concerned about the difficulties faced by such working women, introduced a scheme in 1972-73 of grant-in- aid for construction of new/ expansion of existing buildings for providing hostel facilities to working women in cities, smaller towns and also in rural areas where employment opportunities for women exist. Based on an evaluation, the existing scheme has been revised to promote availability of safe and conveniently located accommodation for working women who need to live away from their families due to professional commitments.

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to above scheme?

A. Nationwide rollout of ABDM was done in 2021

B. A 16-digit health ID is provided to enrolled beneficiaries

C. Financial outlay for ABDM is Rs. 1600 crore
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following are the components under ABDM?
options: ABHA (Ayushman Bharat Health Account)
Healthcare Professionals Registry (HPR)
Health Facility Registry (HFR)
Health Information Exchange & Consent Manager (HIE-CM)
All of the above

quiz.text: _____   will store all medical details of person including prescriptions, treatment, diagnostic reports etc.
options: Health Facility Registry (HFR)
Health ID card

ABHA (Ayushman Bharat Health Account)
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with respect to the ﻿Biogas Programme?

A. ﻿﻿Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) is the nodal ministry for the scheme.

B. It is a central sector scheme.

C. It aims to aid installation of biogas plants and its use as source of alternative fuels for cooking purposes.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C

None of the above

C. ﻿Additional incentives for linking the cattle dung based biogas plants with the ﻿sanitary toilets and Biogas slurry filter Unit.

quiz.text:
Following people approached a regional rural bank (RRB) to avail loan under Kisan Credit Card scheme. Whose loan(s) will get approved as per the scheme guidelines?

A. An individual farmer cultivating 2.5-acre self-owned land

B. A tenant farmer doing cultivation on 5-acre land

C. A joint liability group of sharecroppers
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
None of the above
A, B and C

C. ﻿An elected MP cannot recommend works anywhere in the country outside the usual region in which he/ she can recommend work.

None of the above

None of the Above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. In case of payment of tax, a taxpayer would be required to pay only the amount of the disputed taxes and will get complete waiver of interest, penalty and prosecution provided he/she pays by March 31, 2021.

C. Appellate forum can make a decision in relation to the matter of dispute once it is resolved.

quiz.text:
Which of the following can be the beneficiaries of the above scheme?

A. Asha who just got divorce from her partner five months ago.

B. Sheela who is married and her husband stays in the same town of the hostel.

C. Geetha who has lost her husband in the recent cyclone.
options: A only
B only
A and C only
A and B only
All A, B and C
